children.value: This is a basic reminder on how to declare
and import those packages when running Gradle tests.
Given the following example to test a
Java class, we have the following layout for the

└── src
    ├── main
    │   └── java
    │       ├── LinkedList.java
    │       └── Node.java
    └── test
        └── java
            └── LinkedListTest.java
Notice here that the package itself is has the
For this particular test, we also need to import the
package to ensure we can create nodes for the LinkedList.
